tool_description: The photo editing capability can transfer the style of the input reference image, such as lighting and color, to the target image without affecting the structure of the original image.
name: Refer picture Restoring picture
title: Refer picture Restoring picture

api_list.name: Refer picture Restoring picture

required_parameters.name: style
required_parameters.description:
Reference image.
- **Image format**: `JPEG` `JPG` `PNG`
- **Image size**: No more than 3 MB.
- **Image resolution**: Larger than 32x32px, smaller than 3000x3000px.

required_parameters.name: image
required_parameters.description:
Images that require a style transformation.
- **Image format**: `JPEG` `JPG` `PNG`
- **Image size**: No more than 3 MB.
- **Image resolution**: Larger than 32x32px, smaller than 3000x3000px.
